description.value: The Character counts as having Mechanicus Implants Trait, although does not gain its normal effects, as they have devised the implants themselves and so many instead of other equivalent devices of their own making.

system.benefit: The Character counts as having Mechanicus Implants Trait, although does not gain its normal effects, as they have devised the implants themselves and so many instead of other equivalent devices of their own making.

specialAbilities.name: Repair Heretek Devices
specialAbilities.description: You can repair and maintain heretical technology and xenos devices without suffering Corruption.
